snippet.textDisplay: Whoever made this list has no taste in music. I have never seen such a generic and boring bunch of songs. ofcourse alot of good songs are scattered in here aswell but its like the person in question never actually played the games only heard about them and randomly picked a couple of songs from each game. This for example is textbook generic videogame music. Great game but not alot of good music.
snippet.textOriginal: Whoever made this list has no taste in music. I have never seen such a generic and boring bunch of songs. ofcourse alot of good songs are scattered in here aswell but its like the person in question never actually played the games only heard about them and randomly picked a couple of songs from each game. I played all Castlevania games, and have to say that the games of CV for the new Nintendo consoles's(GBA, DS, Wii) are the worst of the saga. The anime style and make the games a bit ridyculous.
The OST of the games of Playstation are so much better.

snippet.textDisplay:
Heh, good song this one. There's a measure that reminds me a bit of Reincarnated Soul from Bloodlines.

This game and Portrait of Ruin have the best soundtracks ever created. The best songs from this game are Mortvia Aqueduct, Forest of Jigramunt and Baljheit Mountains.
